import React from 'react'; export default function About () { return (

About this Data

Grammys

Notes:

  • These are known as the "big four" categories for the Grammy Awards — Album Of The Year, Record Of The Year, Song Of The Year, and Best New Artist.
  • For Record of the Year, Album of the Year and Song of the Year the performing artist is the only winner listed (not the other winners like the engineers or song writers).
  • There was no Best New Artist winner in 1958 and 1966.

Source:

  • Grammy Awards Nomimations & Winners

MTV Video Music Awards

Notes:

  • Artist of the Year was first introduced at the 2017 MTV Video Music Awards, replacing both the awards for Best Male Video and Best Female Video as MTV want to eliminate gender-specific awards.
  • The Best Group award was called Best Group Video before 2007. This awards was not given from 2008 to 2018.

Sources:

  • Wikipedia: Video of the Year
  • Wikipedia: Artist of the Year
  • Wikipedia: Best Male Video
  • Wikipedia: Best Female Video
  • Wikipedia: Best New Artist
  • Wikipedia: Best Group

Billboard Music Awards

Notes:

Source:

  • Billboard Music Awards: Winners Database

American Music Awards

Notes:

  • Artist of the Year reflects works released in the previous year.
  • New Artist of the Year was called Breakthrough Artist from 2004 - 2010.

Source:

  • American Music Awards: Winners Database

Super Bowl Halftime Show Headliner

Notes:

  • All of the Super Bowl halftime shows had performers, but we're only including what's considered a 'headline performer'.

Source:

  • Wikipedia: List of Super Bowl halftime shows (History section)
) }
